• Your Space,
    Your Signature Style

  • Discover the Art
    of Living

  • Where Style
    Meets Comfort

About Our Design
Philosophy

About Us

Your Dream, Our Vision & Expertise

Read More About us
  • About
  • Vision
  • Mission

VIVID INTERIORS is Architectural, interior and Contracting company located in Pune since 2018, we are committed to steadily curating spatial ideas that meet the demands of the ever-evolving AEC industry with design deliverables that are not only aesthetically pleasing, but also satisfy client requirements.
We at Vivid interiors are driven by the ethos of Design – Excellence, Service Efficiency, Responsiveness and a Strong Commitment towards all projects and scale undertaken by us. Our goal is always to create designs tailored to our client’s unique personal styles and practical needs. We optimize available resources to design buildings and interiors that are driven not only by beauty of form but value in function. Acknowledging the role of Information Technology in design, architecture and Construction practices, specializing in both residential and commercial design.

We are not just a Designing and Construction Company. We are a dedicated team striving to bring growth to our community, helping and assist our clients in making their dreams become a reality.

We are committed to building long-term relationships based on integrity, performance, value, and client satisfaction. We will continue to meet the changing needs of our clients with our quality services delivered by the most qualified people.

Space Planning and Layout
0%
Timeline and Quality
0%
Project Challenges and Solutions
0%

Our Process

In a typical project timeline, we start by conducting an initial consultation to understand your requirements, vision, preferences, and budget. Then, we proceed to develop a customized design plan that includes concept development, designing, color schemes, selection on materials and furnishings, and creating a cohesive design scheme. Once the design plan is approved, we manage the procurement and installation process, coordinating with vendors and contractors to ensure seamless execution. Finally, we add the finishing touches, carefully selecting accessories and styling the space to perfection.
Fill The Enquiry
Meet & Agree
Idea & Concept
Design & Create
Build & Install

Initial Consultation

The process begins with an initial consultation where a representative from Inspired Interiors meets with the client to discuss their project requirements, goals, and vision.

Project Assessment and Space Analysis

The design team conducts a thorough assessment of the space, taking measurements, photographs, and gathering any relevant architectural drawings or floor plans.

Design Concept Development

Based on the client's preferences and the information gathered during the assessment, Inspired Interiors develops a design concept.

Design Presentation and Approval

Inspired Interiors presents the design concept and space plans to the client, utilizing visual aids such as 3D renderings, sketches, and material samples.

Conceptual Drawings| sketches| theme presentation| layouts| services drawings| budget analysis| quality check| cordination| excellent workmanship| innovative| transperent| trendy| professional| responsible|
Conceptual Drawings| sketches| theme presentation| layouts| services drawings| budget analysis| quality check| cordination| excellent workmanship| innovative| transperent| trendy| professional| responsible|

Elevate Your Interiors

All Services

Designing Interiors That Leave a Lasting Impression

Consultation
Design consultants suggest ideas that will create a space or product that integrates form, functionality, and aesthetics.
Design built
unified flow of work from initial concept through completion, includes Designing, material procurement, execution and supervision,
furniture selection and procurement
Taking into consideration design idiology, themes and concepts, furniture, fixtures are selected and procured.
Architectural service

 Architectural services include design, preparation of construction documents, and construction administration.

Landscape design
landscape designing is the planning, designing and managing of open spaces to create urban and rural environments it includes composition, combination,proportion, order, repetition, and unity as per design.
3D Visualization
Available data according to design is collaborated and reflected to produce accurate image of how it will look like in real life.
Lighting Design
the lighting design is a study on the light of each space, its application and its interaction with other elements to fulfill requirment.
Project Management
This involves organizing and coordinating the scope, timeline, budget, resources and tasks required to complete a design for a client and achieve the project goals within the necessary constraints. 
Modular furniture

It is where furniture are made in factory as per site measurements and finalized details.

Latest Projects

Designing the Extraordinary, Project by Project

Get in Touch

Contact Us

Building Relationships, One Conversation at a Time

Have a project in mind?

Do not hesitate to say Hello

Let's Talk

Our Clients

Experience the difference with our customer service.

Testimonials

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 OIpramod pune 
 
2024-08-14
 
 
  
We just renovated our home by vivid interiors. Team responded to our requirements very fast, so we could get idea on commercials and finalise them looking at their taste on design. Initially work progressed very fast, in middle of project we had some skepticism on pace of work but we could understand this is beacuse of finishing. We believe time they took for finishing was worth invested. Products they delivered were fantastic and undoubtably adding aesthetics in a greate way!
  
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Shivank Purwar 
 
2024-07-08
 
 
  
I absolutely adore my new space and I am forever grateful to you and your team ! They were professional, friendly, knowledgable and helpful throughout !! they done the work in best time and at nice prices alsoo
  
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Yuvraj gandhmal 
 
2024-05-19
 
 
  
Vivid interior was a dream to work with!
Their team is always ready with home work, incredibly professional, attentive to detail, and always willing to go the extra mile. They transformed our home into exactly what we envisioned, and we are really enjoying living in a better place.
Highly recommend!
  
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Abhishek Siddhaling Patil 
 
2024-05-06
 
 
  
It seems one of the difficult task to hire a interior designer as there are multiple fraud practices are going in market.
We have visited many studios and then finalised vivid interiors. They took us to their completed projects and we personally saw their projects.
We are happy to have vivid interiors for our 3bhk flat in wakad.
Their procedure, design finalization, material selection and also billing cycle is easy to understand and accept. As we too feel what they suggest and demand is worth doing.
We are very happy with your service.
Thank you for team
  
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 payal suryavanshi 
 
2024-03-26
 
 
  
Amazing experience!
I contacted Vivid interiors to design and execute my 3BHK house in model colony, Pune
When I went with them to select materials like Veneers and marbles etc. at that time one of the owner of the store said “This company, vivid interiors comes under very few Interior designers & architects who does not take any kind of commission or extra favor from us”. This becomes the signing copy for hiring designer. They have very clear and clean mindset regarding designing and their profession, this avoids issues.
Even their Quotation (BOQ) was very easy to understand. Vivid interiors is really a transparent and clear minded company.
Keep it up!
  
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Rajaram Dasari 
 
2024-03-23
 
 
  
Great job!!!
I did my homes interiors with vivid Interiors, When we entered into while handover my parents were surprised to the beauty of every area. I was the only one from my family engaged with vivid interiors.
The color combinations, material selection, hardware knowledge is really brilliant.
Really Appreciate the team and wish them all success in all FUTURE PROJECTS..
  
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 vaibhav 
 
2024-03-21
 
 
  
I have got my Bungalow designs from VI, excellent work, genuine people and bound to make promises fulfilled.
  
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Dinesh Kairamkonda 
 
2024-03-17
 
 
  
This team has provided exceptional service for our turnkey interior design project! The team's creativity and attention to details of every space turned things very well. Professionalism at its best. Highly recommended
  
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 RAVINDRA Kairamkonda 
 
2024-03-16
 
 
  
Cost efficient, best quality interiors. I had already started my interior with a carpenter and some reference images from Pinterest. But it was such a blunder on site. We ruined our money and time. Later  we came to know about Vivid Interiors from my friend.
I find their quote little expensive but as i was having horrible experience with an earlier carpenter, we decided to go with vivid Interiors. They insisted us not to start execution without final drawings and finishing material choices. Every small details were considered prior to starting with execution. It is  truly a one stop solution. Special thanks to team for taking such a project and completing with best outputs. We will definitely recommend it to our friends and family.

Follow Us on Instagram
